about_the_game:
A turn-based multiplayer strategy game inspired by Into The Breach. Take down your opponent’s bases or characters to win. Strategize, position your squad, and battle both rivals and zombies. Customize your deck to boost your bases and characters. Pick 3 unique heroes, each with special skills, and show off your strategic skills to become the top zombie hunter in The South Pole!

Multiplayer (Player VS Player)

The multiplayer mode is tailored for 2 players. You can be matched with random players of similar skill or invite a friend to join your lobby using a lobby code.

Player VS AI Bot

Compete against a powerful AI Bot. The AI Bot adjusts to your skill level, encouraging you to develop new and sophisticated strategies.

Create two unique decks of characters and ability cards before your game. The deck collects information about your win rate with a particular character and card setup. Evaluate your decks and opt for the most potent one. Experiment with different card and character combinations to craft the optimal strategy. Be mindful of your deck selection as it decides the outcome of your game.

Character deck

Choose 3 characters from a selection of unlockable characters, each boasting distinct abilities. These characters are divided into three classes: melee, artillery, and ranged. Regardless of your preference for a specific class or attacking style, you have the freedom to mix and match characters to suit your strategic preferences, whether that means engaging enemies up close or from a distance.

Card deck

Equip up to 15 ability cards into your deck. Use these cards to boost your characters or bases with special powers, like healing or fortifying. Collect cores by battling zombies or opponents to earn more cards. Spend your cores wisely, as they are key to your strategy.

Introducing a PvPvE (Player vs Player (or AI Bot) vs Environment) battle. In this setup, both players (or a Player and AI Bot) confront each other as well as the challenging game Environment, symbolized by zombies. Zombies serve as a mutual adversary for both players, neutral and hostile to all parties involved.

Zombies

Zombies act each round, attacking bases or characters of either player. While both players can fight zombies, they’re tough and keep spawning. The more you fight them, the more they target you. Master the zombies and use your deck to shift their focus to your opponent.

name: South Pole Bebop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 2.1 or higher. Intel HD 3000 or better.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 2.1 or higher. Intel HD 3000 or better.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews:
“I really enjoyed my time with South Pole Bebop, and am genuinely excited for the game that it could become”
Dann Sullivan, Big Boss Battle
short_description: A multiplayer turn-based strategy game inspired by Into The Breach, set on a 9x9 board, where you control characters and protect bases. Create a unique deck of ability cards and characters. Eliminate the opponent while fending off a zombie horde. Become a savior of The South Pole!
